column4: guys, I need a mail server strictly for sending mail for an application we have running on an ubuntu server. we don't need it for receiving and delivering mail to users. for this use case, which is better, sendmail or postfix?
I need something lightweight that wont consume to much of the server's resources
If you only want to send mail, why not just configure your app to send mail via e.g. smtp.googlemail.com ?
